Title: How to learn Bootstrap
Content: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains HTML, CSS and (optionally) JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components. As of December 2022, Bootstrap is the 14th most starred project (4th most starred library) on GitHub, with over 161,000 stars
Author: Jhon Ahmed
metadesc: Learn Bootstrap in few minutes. To achieve this result in Bootstrap, one would have to apply a set of classes created by the library. The code will be available on GitHub.
